proposal: Hey there P2P Bitcoin trading enthusiasts! Congrats on hitting the 25907 holders mark. With 7 years in business and over 100,000 registered users, your platform is quite a powerhouse. Have you considered deploying a DEX or a blockchain-based lottery to share the revenue even more? It's all about giving power to the community, just like your non-custodial approach. See my profile for demo and details.
